amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce Economic Support Fund funding to the FY18 enacted level.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce Economic Support Fund funding to the FY18 enacted level.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 297 (Roll no. 468).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 297 (Roll no. 468).
